Interface StarknetSdkConfig

interface StarknetSdkConfig {
    network: StarknetConfig;
    paymasters?: PaymasterConfig[];
    ui?: {
        modal?: WalletModalConfig;
        theme?: WalletTheme;
    };
    wallets?: {
        connectors?: WalletConnector[];
        embedded?: EmbeddedWalletOptions;
    };
}
